column4: How come when I right-click on a program I don't get a context menu and it starts up instead? Won't even let me drag it to Quicklaunch button it that way either...
How come when I right-click on a program I don't get a context menu and it starts up instead? Won't even let me drag it to Quicklaunch button it that way either...
you dont always get what you pay for, but you always pay for what you get
